mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE REC_A_DATE_CREATED BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT REC_A_POST_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, REC_A_ID, REC_A_IMG_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_A_KEYWORD_ID, REC_A_TITLE, REC_A_DATE_CREATED, REC_A_VIEW_COUNT, REC_A_FAVORITE_CNT FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE REC_A_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT REC_A_POST_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, REC_A_ID, REC_A_IMG_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_A_KEYWORD_ID,REC_A_TITLE, REC_A_DATE_CREATED, REC_A_VIEW_COUNT, REC_A_FAVORITE_CNT FROM REC_ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE SIGUNGU_ID=#{sigungu} )
